 2019-08282019-06-19ND,  DND,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of GREGORY ANNIS LICK of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, as Ombudsperson for the Department of National Defence and the Canadian Forces, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective July 2, 2019.
